item.title: EP 243 - Ghostly Hitchhikers: An Interactive Adventure!
item.itunes:title: Ghostly Hitchhikers: An Interactive Adventure!
item.description:
Today we meet a sexy cryptid and then we take an interactive adventure down haunted highways!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Reptilian Humanoid Startles Oklahoma Dispatcher

http://cryptozoologynews.com/reptilian-humanoid-startles-oklahoma-dispatcher/

 

10 California Roads Haunted by Hitchhiking Ghosts

https://backpackerverse.com/california-roads-hitchhiking-ghosts/

 

What is the story behind the Proctor Valley Monster?

https://www.sandiegoreader.com/news/2001/mar/08/what-story-behind-proctor-valley-monster/#

 

Carl Alfred Eder

https://unsolvedmysteries.fandom.com/wiki/Carl_Alfred_Eder

 

When you investigated Old Stage Road near Salinas . . .

https://www.facebook.com/therealzakbagans/posts/when-you-investigated-old-stage-road-near-salinas-why-didnt-you-go-to-where-ther/10154129592666805/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
